Hi all

I have an Apache trying to ProxyPass some location to another Apache.
The frontend one listens on https, the backend one on http.
In case the backend sends 301 I can rewrite the host address using ProxyPreserveHost On.
The browser then tries to connect with the protocol the backend has set in the redirect, which fails of course. I didn't find any way around this. So I propose that ProxyPreserveHost should also care about the protocol.

I would prepare some patch if you agree.

Greetings
Johannes Müller
